product_name: prAna Vivi Capri Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Wear the prAna Vivi capri pants to the gym or yoga studio and stay comfortable during intense workouts or inspiring practice. Stay cool with moisture-wicking nylon and spandex blend; 4-way stretch encourages full range of motion. Relaxed construction drapes loosely on the body for a roomy fit. Internal stash pocket lets you carry small essentials. Made with prAna Chakara performance fabric, Vivi pants are designed to feel as soft and natural as cotton while retaining the performance benefits of synthetic fabrics. Closeout.
short_description: Wear the prAna Vivi capri pants to the gym or yoga studio and stay comfortable during intense workouts or inspiring practice.
